snippet.title: Call to Arms - Gates of Hell: Scorched Earth release teaser
snippet.description:
The “Scorched Earth” expansion redefines the Eastern Front with a stunning arsenal for multiplayer, plus brand new single player content to complete the most brutal theater of the war. From the Siege of Sevastopol to the very last offensives of WWII in the east.
Available on Steam NOW:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2123890/Call_to_Arms__Gates_of_Hell_Scorched_Earth/

Real Time Strategy WWII Game for PC, published june 2021
Ostfront Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/400750
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/zyRrWbDV2F
Community Hub:
http://steamcommunity.com/app/400750​
Homepage:
https://www.barbed-wire.eu/​
